data.name: ConfirmModuleUpdateMessage
data.value:
Module with the same name already exists. Its structure and settings will be updated.

The initial module fields which do not exist in the new module structure will be deleted and their data will be lost.

Before import, we recommend that you back up your initial module and database

What do you want to do?
data.comment: Update module confirmation message.

data.comment: phrase: Update
